alert.note: Alert for Barber; Clark; Comanche; Kiowa (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 1:26AM CDT until July 21 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 200 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN KIOWA...WESTERN BARBER...COMANCHE AND SOUTHEASTERN CLARK COUNTIES... At 126 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles northwest of Coldwater to near Protection to 8 miles west of Buttermilk to 6 miles north of Buffalo, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Coldwater, Protection, Sitka, Lake City, Sun City, Wilmore, Aetna, Lake Coldwater, Belvidere and Buttermilk. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
